article: Hello, everyone .I'm Wang Li .Now let me tell you my dream job .I'm going to be an _ doctor because I like animals very much . _ can I be doctor for animals ? First ,I'm going to study hard now at school .Then I'm going to go to a _ university to learn more about animals .After I leave university ,I'm going to find a job _ a doctor in an animal hospital .After many years ,I'm going to retire _ beautiful .I'm going to build a big garden and I'm going to keep many animals in the garden .Wow ,I feel excited!
